roleset.name: (cause to) become filled with air
roleset.note: PNEUMATIZE-V, PNEUMATIZATION-N, PNEUMATIC-J NOTES: Added by Julia

example.name: pneumatize-v
example.text: The intrathoracic diverticula of the saccus inter- clavicularis pneumatize the sternum and the sterno-costal bones;
example.arg: The intrathoracic diverticula of the saccus inter- clavicularis
the sternum and the sterno-costal bones

example.name: pneumatization-n
example.text: Arrested skull base pneumatization is a benign developmental variant that can be confused with significant skull base disease processes.

example.name: pneumatized-j
example.text: Many modern birds are extensively pneumatized.
